content: Awesome article Mark. I would run through a brick wall for this guy (is that a metaphor you can use in basketball?). I’m a U.Va. fan and am very impressed with Thad. He’s given us some of our toughest games. The 16-point deficit last night was the largest since we were down 37(!) against Tennessee three years ago. I didn’t know about the botched back surgery. His attitude about it is awesome and more people (including myself) should take that on.
